Yokai pen plotting

2022 | Computational design | Gh/G-code

An experiment in pen plotting a Karasu Tengu drawing by Yuki Okuno using a 3D printer. A Grasshopper algorithm converts 2D curves into toolpaths and G-code for brush pen drawing on a 3D printer (Kingroon KP3S). A slight up and down movement was added to replicate the movement of a brush.
